SEARCH
Package wss.brain

Class SurvivalBrain

java.lang.Object
wss.brain.Brain
wss.brain.SurvivalBrain
public class SurvivalBrain extends Brain
SurvivalBrain always seeks food and water bonuses, regardless of the current resource levels. If none are visible, it attempts to move EAST, and if EAST is not enterable, moves to any valid adjacent square.

    • initiateTrade

      public void initiateTrade(Player player, Trader trader)
      Attempts to initiate a trade with the given trader. The SurvivalBrain accepts trades only if they cost very little and provide critical resources (food/water), while ensuring survival priorities are met.
      Specified by:
      initiateTrade in class Brain
      Parameters:
      player - The player using this brain.
      trader - The trader the player is attempting to trade with.
